title: Biker pulls up beside his ex-girlfriend's wedding car and begs her not to get married
text:
A motorcyclist was caught on camera after he pulled up beside his ex-girlfriend's wedding car on her way to the ceremony to beg her not to go through with it.

The footage was captured by an onlooker in the city of Medellin in Antioquia, Colombia.

In the video, the unnamed biker has forced the bride-to-be's wedding car to come to a halt as it heads down a busy city street on its way to the chapel.

The biker, dressed in black with a blue helmet, walks towards the bride-to-be's vehicle.

The side door to the antique car is open as the two seemingly exchange heated words.

She puts her head in her hands as he lifts his helmet to plead with her.

The biker leans toward the woman, who is sitting in her wedding dress and veil, with his hand extended but she grabs it before he can touch her face.

The footage was captured by an onlooker in the city of Medellin in Antioquia, Colombia, as the biker dropped to his knees to beg the bride-to-be not to go through with it

The woman is left in distress as he approaches her and onlookers shout 'don't get married' and 'kiss, kiss'

He then drops to his knees as he continues to beg her not to go through with the ceremony.

Onlookers jeer as the bizarre encounter continues and the bride shakes her head in disbelief.

The biker stands back up and leans towards her as if to kiss her before she forcefully shoves him away.

The woman is left in distress as spectators can apparently be heard in the background shouting 'don't get married' and 'kiss, kiss'.

The pair are left in a standoff as the biker continues to gesture toward her, which is where the video ends.

The biker stands back up before leaning towards the woman, who is sitting in the antique car, as if trying to kiss her

She forcefully shoves him away, which is where the video ends. It is believed that after the camera stops filming the bride drives off and leaves the biker by himself

It is thought that the bride drove away a short time later and left the biker alone on his two-wheeler, according to local media reports.

Social media users were quick to criticise the biker's actions as they commented on the clip after it was posted online.

One user, Rosibel Lopez Gomez, wrote: 'He lost his opportunity when he was with her, now let her marry in peace, sh*t.'

Another, Flor de Primavera, added: 'What a humiliating situation, ridiculous, nobody is forcing anybody to marry, whoever is getting married does it because they want to, it is nothing about confusion, everybody is responsible for their choices in life, the woman decided to get married, and this guy is humiliating a woman who does not love him anymore.'

Neither the bride nor the biker have been identified.
description: The footage was captured by an onlooker in the city of Medellin in Antioquia, Colombia. It is thought that his pleading did not work as the bride drove away a short time later and left the biker alone.
